Translations.Text: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo Allah yahaga isezerano rikomeye abahawe igitabo (cya Tawurati n’Ivanjili) ry’ukobagomba kubisobanurira abantu batabihisha, arikobabiteye umugongo babigurana ikiguzi gito. Ibyo bahisemo ni bibi
Ntukibwire kobabandi bishimira ibikorwa (bibi) bakoze, bakanakunda gushimirwa ibyo batakoze; rwose ntutekereze ko bazakiranuka n’ibihano; ahubwo bazahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
Kandi ubwami bw’ibirere n’ubw’isi ni ubwa Allah,ndetse Allah ni Ushobora byose
Mu by’ukuri, mu kuremwa kw’ibirere n’isi no gusimburanakw’ijoro n’amanywa, harimo ibimenyetso ku banyabwenge

Babandi basingiza Allah, baba bahagaze, bicaye, baryamye, bakanatekereza ku iremwa ry’ibirere n’isi (bagira bati) "Nyagasani wacu! Ibi ntiwabiremye nta mpamvu. Ubutagatifu ni ubwawe! Bityo, turinde ibihano by’umuriro
Nyagasani wacu! Mu by’ukuri, uwo uzinjiza mu muriro uzaba umusuzuguje; kandi inkozi z’ibibintizizigera zibona abatabazi

Nyagasani wacu! Mu by’ukuri, twumvise umuhamagazi (Intumwa Muhamadi), uhamagarira ukwemera (agira ati) "Nimwemere Nyagasani wanyu", nuko turemera. None Nyagasani wacu! Tubabarire ibyaha byacu, udukize ibicumuro byacu, kandi uzadukure ku isi turi mu beza
Nyagasani wacu! Unaduhe ibyo wadusezeranyije binyuze ku ntumwa zawe. Kandi ntuzadukoze isoni ku munsi w’imperuka, kuko mu by’ukuri utajya wica isezerano (ryawe)
